thread.section_title: HiFX New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX New Zealand | www.hifx.co.nz
thread.title: Peter
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: I started using HIFX, at their Windsor office, before we emigrated from the UK to NZ in 2007 and have continued to do so, via the Auckland office, for the past 10 years. It used to be a matter of a phone call to the dealings desk; I got to recognise the voices of the guys each time I called but, recently, I've been using the on-line service which is 'open all hours'. I can use Market Watch to time the deals and the on-line Quote: tells me exactly how much I'll get, and when. It's so easy and efficient - the deals go through 'like clock-work'.
